DOC.brief_summary: An efficacy and safety study of hydrochlorothiazide (+) losartan potassium compared to amlodipine at week 12 in Korean patients with essential hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Hydrochlorothiazide (+) Losartan Potassium vs. Amlodipine Comparative Study (0954A-314)
DOC.criteria: Patients of age 20 70 75 with essential hypertension SiDBP 90 ~ 114mmHg at V1 & V2 Patient has known or suspected secondary hypertension Patient has a history of malignant hypertension (SiSBP > 210mmHg) Individuals has a known sensitivity or intolerance to HCTZ or any AIIAs, or any sulfonamidederived drugs. Patient has shown significant abnormal laboratory evaluations
